system.effect: The attack rips open the target's face with a vicious shredding sound. He is Stunned for 1 round and suffers Blood Loss. If he is wearing a helmet, it is torn off.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Head (Severity 3)

The attack rips open the target's face with a vicious shredding sound. He is Stunned for 1 round and suffers Blood Loss. If he is wearing a helmet, it is torn off.
